mapper.insert: insert into info(id, uuid, driver_id, latitude, longitude, status, warning, gmt_time, ip, water_temp, oil_temp, speed, rotating_speed, stalls, oil_pressure, voltage, gmt_create) values (#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{carNumber}, #{driver}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{breakdown}, #{warning}, #{reportDate}, #{ip}, #{waterTemperature}, #{oilTemperature}, #{speed}, #{rotatingSpeed}, #{stalls}, #{oilPressure}, #{voltage}, #{gmtCreate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from car where uuid = #{carNumber}
